alert.note: Alert for Creek; Osage; Pawnee; Tulsa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 13 at 11:25PM CDT until August 14 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL OSAGE...CREEK...SOUTHEASTERN PAWNEE AND WEST CENTRAL TULSA COUNTIES... At 1125 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 2 miles west of Yale to 3 miles north of Shamrock, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations in or near the path include... Sand Springs... Bristow... Sapulpa... Mannford... Drumright... Kellyville... Oilton... Depew... Jennings... Westport... Hallett... Terlton... Shamrock... Keystone State Park... Walnut Creek State Park... Silver City... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 178 and 210. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
